segments.text: Would you consider an offer of $ 56,000 per year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of benefits are we talking about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our standard package includes health insurance , two weeks vacation and a company car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh ... not normally . What do you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Vacation time is important to me . I would be willing to give up these other items in order to receive more vacation days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What an interesting idea , Ms . Wilson . Would you also be willing to accept a cut in initial salary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Possibly . What do you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2
